title: Ruth Bader Ginsburg undergoing chemotherapy treatment
description: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg said she is undergoing chemotherapy to treat a recurrence of cancer. The treatment is yielding "positive results." She says she remains "fully able" to continue in her post.

title: A teenager created an anti-racism calendar to make it easier for everyone to become an ally

title: Trump rips Mary Trump in first comments about her book
description: President Donald Trump tore into his niece Mary Trump after days of silence about her recently published book, which is critical of the President and his family, calling her "a mess" and alleging she wrote "untruthful things."

title: Residents of a Kenyan village awarded $12 million in a lawsuit over lead poisoning
